message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique product at a price of $1,400,000. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe it's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1,200,000 simply doesn't reflect the product's true value.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,300,000. This is a fair price that benefits both of us. Let's find a way to make this work!

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I still think $1,300,000 is a bit high. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $1,250,000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.
